title: AWS Lambda Serverless Development
description: Build serverless applications using AWS Lambda, API Gateway, and DynamoDB. Learn event-driven architecture, function deployment, and monitoring. Includes hands-on project deploying a REST API.

title: Build a Chatbot with LangChain
description: Create an AI chatbot using LangChain, OpenAI API, and vector databases. Learn prompt engineering, RAG, and memory management. Deploy to production with FastAPI.

title: Docker and Kubernetes Fundamentals
description: Master containerization with Docker and orchestration with Kubernetes. Build, deploy, and scale microservices. Includes CI/CD pipeline integration.

title: FastAPI REST API Development
description: Build production-ready APIs with FastAPI. Learn async programming, database integration with SQLAlchemy, authentication, and API documentation.

title: React Interview Preparation
description: Practice React hooks, state management, and component patterns. 50+ coding challenges with solutions. Prepare for technical interviews.

title: PostgreSQL Database Design
description: Learn database normalization, indexing, query optimization, and transactions. Build a real-world e-commerce database schema.

title: Build a To-Do App with Vue 3
description: Create a full-stack to-do application using Vue 3 Composition API, Pinia for state management, and Node.js backend. Deploy to Vercel.

title: AWS Solutions Architect Certification Prep
description: Comprehensive preparation for AWS SAA-C03 exam. Covers EC2, S3, Lambda, RDS, VPC, and more. 300+ practice questions.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning with Python
description: Learn ML fundamentals with scikit-learn. Cover classification, regression, clustering, and model evaluation. Build 5 real-world projects.

title: Git and GitHub Mastery
description: Master version control with Git. Learn branching, merging, rebasing, pull requests, and collaborative workflows. Includes GitHub Actions CI/CD.

title: Build a Weather App with Next.js 14
description: Create a weather application using Next.js App Router, Server Components, and external APIs. Deploy to Vercel with automatic CI/CD.

title: Redis Caching and Performance Optimization
description: Learn Redis fundamentals, caching strategies, and session management. Optimize application performance with in-memory data storage.

title: Node.js Microservices Architecture
description: Build scalable microservices with Node.js, Express, RabbitMQ, and Docker. Learn service communication, API gateway patterns, and deployment.

title: TypeScript for JavaScript Developers
description: Learn TypeScript fundamentals, type inference, generics, and advanced types. Migrate existing JavaScript projects to TypeScript.

title: Build a Task Management API with Django REST
description: Create a production-ready REST API using Django REST Framework. Implement authentication, permissions, filtering, and pagination.

title: GraphQL API Development
description: Build GraphQL APIs with Apollo Server and Node.js. Learn schema design, resolvers, mutations, and subscriptions. Integrate with React frontend.

title: MongoDB Database Administration
description: Master MongoDB CRUD operations, aggregation pipeline, indexing, and replication. Build a blog application with Mongoose ODM.

title: Build a Real-Time Chat App with Socket.io
description: Create a real-time chat application using Socket.io, Node.js, and React. Implement rooms, private messaging, and typing indicators.

title: Linux System Administration Essentials
description: Learn Linux fundamentals, shell scripting, user management, networking, and security. Practice on Ubuntu and CentOS.

title: TensorFlow 2.0 Deep Learning
description: Build neural networks with TensorFlow 2.0. Learn CNNs, RNNs, transfer learning, and model deployment. 10+ hands-on projects.

title: Build an E-Commerce Store with Stripe
description: Create a full-stack e-commerce application with payment processing using Stripe API. Includes shopping cart, checkout, and order management.

title: Terraform Infrastructure as Code
description: Learn infrastructure automation with Terraform. Provision AWS resources, manage state, and implement modules. Deploy multi-tier applications.

title: Build a Portfolio Website with Tailwind CSS
description: Design and build a responsive portfolio website using Tailwind CSS and HTML. Learn utility-first CSS and modern design principles.

title: Angular Complete Guide
description: Master Angular framework from basics to advanced. Learn components, services, routing, RxJS, and state management with NgRx.

title: Pytest Testing Framework
description: Write effective unit and integration tests with Pytest. Learn fixtures, mocking, parameterization, and test-driven development (TDD).

title: Build a URL Shortener with Go
description: Create a URL shortening service using Go, Gin framework, and Redis. Learn Go fundamentals, REST APIs, and caching strategies.

title: Jenkins CI/CD Pipeline Mastery
description: Build automated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins. Learn pipeline as code, Docker integration, and deployment automation.

title: OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect
description: Implement secure authentication and authorization with OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect. Learn token-based authentication and SSO.

title: Build a REST API with Flask
description: Create a production-ready REST API using Flask, SQLAlchemy, and JWT authentication. Deploy to Heroku with PostgreSQL.

title: Elasticsearch Full-Text Search
description: Master Elasticsearch for full-text search and analytics. Learn indexing, querying, aggregations, and relevance tuning.

title: Build a Blog with Nuxt 3
description: Create a modern blog using Nuxt 3, Nuxt Content, and Tailwind CSS. Implement SSR, static generation, and SEO optimization.

title: Python Async Programming with asyncio
description: Master asynchronous programming in Python using asyncio. Learn coroutines, tasks, event loops, and concurrent web scraping.

title: AWS ECS and Fargate Deployment
description: Deploy containerized applications using AWS ECS and Fargate. Learn cluster management, service auto-scaling, and load balancing.

title: Build a Kanban Board with React DnD
description: Create a drag-and-drop Kanban board using React, react-beautiful-dnd, and local storage. Implement task management and board persistence.

title: Prometheus and Grafana Monitoring
description: Set up application monitoring with Prometheus and Grafana. Learn metrics collection, alerting rules, and dashboard creation.

title: Svelte and SvelteKit
description: Learn Svelte framework and SvelteKit for building fast web applications. Master reactivity, components, and server-side rendering.

title: Build a Chrome Extension
description: Create a productivity Chrome extension using JavaScript and Chrome APIs. Implement content scripts, background workers, and storage.

title: RabbitMQ Message Queue
description: Learn message queue patterns with RabbitMQ. Implement pub/sub, work queues, and RPC patterns. Build a distributed task system.

title: Rust Programming Fundamentals
description: Learn Rust programming language fundamentals. Master ownership, borrowing, lifetimes, and concurrency. Build CLI applications.

title: Build a Recipe App with Firebase
description: Create a recipe sharing app using React, Firebase Authentication, Firestore, and Firebase Storage. Implement real-time updates.

title: Apache Kafka Streaming
description: Master event streaming with Apache Kafka. Learn producers, consumers, stream processing, and Kafka Connect. Build real-time data pipelines.

title: Tailwind CSS Advanced Patterns
description: Master advanced Tailwind CSS techniques. Learn custom configurations, plugins, component extraction, and design systems.

title: Build a Video Chat App with WebRTC
description: Create a peer-to-peer video chat application using WebRTC, Socket.io, and React. Implement screen sharing and recording.

title: Nginx Web Server and Load Balancing
description: Configure Nginx for high-performance web serving. Learn reverse proxy, load balancing, SSL/TLS, and caching strategies.

title: Celery Task Queue with Django
description: Implement asynchronous task processing with Celery and Django. Learn periodic tasks, task monitoring, and Redis broker configuration.

title: Build a Markdown Editor with React
description: Create a real-time markdown editor using React, marked library, and local storage. Implement syntax highlighting and export functionality.

title: Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals
description: Learn GCP core services including Compute Engine, Cloud Storage, Cloud Functions, and BigQuery. Prepare for Associate Cloud Engineer certification.

title: Vim Text Editor Mastery
description: Master Vim text editor for efficient coding. Learn motions, operators, visual mode, macros, and plugin configuration.

title: Build a Weather Dashboard with OpenWeather API
description: Create a weather dashboard using vanilla JavaScript, OpenWeather API, and Chart.js for data visualization. Implement geolocation.

title: Spring Boot Microservices
description: Build enterprise microservices with Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, and Eureka. Learn service discovery, API gateway, and distributed tracing.

title: PyTorch Deep Learning Specialization
description: Master deep learning with PyTorch. Learn neural networks, CNNs, RNNs, GANs, and transformers. Implement 15+ projects.

title: Build a Quiz App with Vanilla JavaScript
description: Create an interactive quiz application using vanilla JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. Implement timer, scoring, and local storage for high scores.

title: Playwright E2E Testing
description: Learn end-to-end testing with Playwright. Write tests for web applications, implement CI/CD integration, and handle complex user flows.

title: Supabase Backend Development
description: Build full-stack applications with Supabase. Learn PostgreSQL database, authentication, real-time subscriptions, and storage.

title: Build a File Upload System with AWS S3
description: Implement secure file uploads using AWS S3, presigned URLs, and Lambda triggers. Add image processing with Sharp library.

title: Webpack Module Bundler
description: Master Webpack for modern JavaScript bundling. Learn loaders, plugins, code splitting, and optimization techniques.

title: Deno Runtime and Fresh Framework
description: Learn Deno runtime and Fresh framework for building modern web applications. Master TypeScript-first development and island architecture.

title: Build a Social Media Dashboard
description: Create a social media analytics dashboard using React, Recharts, and REST APIs. Implement data visualization and filtering.

title: Ansible Automation and Configuration Management
description: Automate infrastructure with Ansible. Learn playbooks, roles, inventory management, and deployment automation.

title: GitHub Actions CI/CD
description: Build automated workflows with GitHub Actions. Learn workflow syntax, secrets management, and deployment pipelines.

title: Build a Movie Search App with TMDB API
description: Create a movie search and discovery app using React, TMDB API, and React Router. Implement search, filters, and detail pages.

title: Remix Full Stack Framework
description: Build full-stack web applications with Remix. Learn nested routing, data loading, mutations, and progressive enhancement.

title: OpenAI API and GPT Integration
description: Build AI-powered applications with OpenAI API. Learn prompt engineering, embeddings, fine-tuning, and production best practices.

title: Build a Notion Clone
description: Create a Notion-like note-taking app using React, Slate.js for rich text editing, and Firebase for backend. Implement drag-and-drop.

title: Vite Build Tool
description: Master Vite for lightning-fast frontend development. Learn dev server, HMR, build optimizations, and plugin ecosystem.

title: Express.js REST API Best Practices
description: Build production-ready Express.js APIs. Learn error handling, validation, security, rate limiting, and API versioning.

title: Build a Trello Clone with React DnD
description: Create a Trello-like board using React, react-beautiful-dnd, and Context API. Implement lists, cards, and drag-and-drop functionality.

title: Snowflake Data Warehousing
description: Learn cloud data warehousing with Snowflake. Master SQL, data loading, optimization, and analytics workflows.

title: tRPC End-to-End Type Safety
description: Build type-safe APIs with tRPC. Learn end-to-end TypeScript, React Query integration, and server-side procedures.

title: Build a Music Player with Spotify API
description: Create a music player using React, Spotify Web API, and OAuth authentication. Implement playback controls and playlist management.

title: Prisma ORM with TypeScript
description: Master Prisma ORM for type-safe database access. Learn schema modeling, migrations, and query optimization with PostgreSQL.

title: Azure DevOps CI/CD Pipelines
description: Build automated pipelines with Azure DevOps. Learn YAML pipelines, release management, and Azure deployment strategies.

title: Build a Code Editor with Monaco
description: Create a web-based code editor using Monaco Editor (VS Code's editor). Implement syntax highlighting, IntelliSense, and code execution.

title: Zod Schema Validation
description: Learn type-safe schema validation with Zod. Integrate with React Hook Form, tRPC, and API validation.

title: Sanity CMS Headless Development
description: Build content-driven websites with Sanity CMS. Learn GROQ query language, real-time collaboration, and Next.js integration.

title: Build a Twitter Clone with Next.js
description: Create a Twitter-like social media app using Next.js 14, Prisma, tRPC, and NextAuth. Implement posts, likes, follows, and feed.

title: Dart and Flutter Mobile Development
description: Build cross-platform mobile apps with Flutter and Dart. Learn widgets, state management, animations, and native integrations.

title: Stripe Payment Integration Advanced
description: Implement advanced Stripe features including subscriptions, webhooks, payment intents, and customer portal.

title: Build a Video Streaming Platform
description: Create a video streaming service using Node.js, HLS protocol, FFmpeg for transcoding, and AWS CloudFront for CDN.

title: Three.js 3D Web Graphics
description: Create stunning 3D visualizations with Three.js. Learn geometries, materials, lighting, animations, and shader programming.

title: NestJS Backend Framework
description: Build scalable server-side applications with NestJS. Learn dependency injection, modules, guards, interceptors, and microservices.

title: Build a Real Estate Platform
description: Create a real estate listing platform using Next.js, Mapbox for maps, Prisma, and NextAuth. Implement search, filters, and favorites.

title: Solidity Smart Contracts
description: Learn blockchain development with Solidity. Build, test, and deploy smart contracts on Ethereum. Create NFTs and DeFi applications.

title: Astro Static Site Generator
description: Build ultra-fast websites with Astro. Learn island architecture, partial hydration, and multi-framework support.

title: Build a Fitness Tracker App
description: Create a fitness tracking application using React Native, Firebase, and Chart.js. Track workouts, calories, and progress over time.

title: AWS SAM Serverless Framework
description: Build serverless applications with AWS SAM. Learn infrastructure as code, local testing, and CI/CD deployment.

title: Figma to Code with Tailwind
description: Convert Figma designs to production code using Tailwind CSS. Learn design tokens, component extraction, and responsive design.

title: Build an AI Image Generator
description: Create an AI image generation app using DALL-E API, Stable Diffusion, React, and Node.js. Implement prompt engineering and image storage.

title: Kubernetes Certified Administrator (CKA)
description: Prepare for CKA certification. Master cluster architecture, scheduling, networking, storage, and troubleshooting.

title: Qwik Framework
description: Learn Qwik for instant-loading web applications. Master resumability, fine-grained reactivity, and zero hydration.

title: Build a Slack Clone with WebSockets
description: Create a real-time messaging app using React, Node.js, WebSockets, and MongoDB. Implement channels, direct messages, and file sharing.

title: Electron Desktop Apps
description: Build cross-platform desktop applications with Electron and React. Learn IPC, native integrations, and auto-updates.

title: Vector Databases and Embeddings
description: Master vector databases (Pinecone, Qdrant, Weaviate) for AI applications. Learn embeddings, semantic search, and RAG patterns.

title: Build a Job Board Platform
description: Create a job listing platform using Next.js, Prisma, Stripe for job postings, and Algolia for search. Implement filters and email alerts.

title: Serverless Framework with AWS
description: Deploy serverless applications using Serverless Framework. Learn YAML configuration, plugins, and multi-cloud deployment.

title: Framer Motion Animations
description: Create beautiful animations with Framer Motion for React. Learn gestures, variants, layout animations, and scroll-triggered effects.

title: Build a Cryptocurrency Tracker
description: Create a crypto price tracking app using React, CoinGecko API, and Chart.js. Implement real-time updates and portfolio tracking.

title: Cloudflare Workers Edge Computing
description: Deploy edge functions with Cloudflare Workers. Learn KV storage, Durable Objects, and global deployment.

title: Storybook Component Development
description: Build UI component libraries with Storybook. Learn stories, addons, testing, and design system documentation.

title: Build a Learning Management System
description: Create a complete LMS using Next.js, Prisma, Stripe for payments, Mux for video hosting, and NextAuth for authentication.
